artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Artist: Kawanabe Kyōsai; Publisher: Daikokuya Kinnosuke
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: portrait of a woman holding a turquoise pipe with raised gold carvings in her PR hand; woman wears purple kimono with white floral circles and orange striped and blue striped collars; woman's hair ornaments have bird designs and red balls; very large, slightly abstracted purple flowers with leaves and stems in two shades of green behind woman
markings: Artist’s seal: 月 {Tsuki} | Censor seal: 子七改
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Okadaya (Okadaya no uchi 岡田や内)
signed: 艸筆芳年 {sōhitsu Yoshitoshi}, 応需狂斎写 {ōju Kyōsai sha}
title: Wakato
